rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with ample natural light and a private balcony, adhering to Vastu principles for a favorable energy flow.
An open-plan living room that connects seamlessly with the kitchen, providing a free-flowing space for family interaction and gatherings.
A spacious open-plan kitchen designed with an L-shaped layout to maximize the work triangle, featuring a central island for cooking and gathering.
A well-ventilated bathroom with a separate toilet area and ample storage options, following Vastu principles for cleanliness.

openings.description: A two-car garage designed with a direct access to the living room, ensuring convenience and security for the family.

rooms.description: An expansive balcony attached to the master bedroom, offering a serene space for relaxation and enjoying views.
A rooftop terrace designed with seating areas, greenery, and a water feature, creating an outdoor living space that enhances the Bohemian style.

openings.description: A staircase connecting all levels, designed to ensure structural integrity and ease of movement.
